00054    * \param from the level in which x is specified
00055    * \param to the level to translate the coordinate into
00056    * \param method controls whether to return minimum or maximum possible
00057    *  coordinate, when translating from high to low levels.
00058    *  0 : return the minimum possible value
00059    *  1 : return the maximum possible value
00060    *  2 : return the average possible value
00061    * \return the translate coordinate
00062    */
00063   static int convCoord(int x, int from, int to=0, unsigned method = 0);
